@stenioz: Thank you for your appreciation.
@spitfire486: No, doesn't. The sport-tvshow (soccer, basketball etc.) ripers try to improve the quality of their rip. So, for any game you could find 10-15 ripformats, from 8-10 GB (FullHD no compress) at 300-400 MB (low quality). I try to up best quality at 700-1400 MB (that including differents fps) from HDD space and internet bandwidth reasons. For example, extremezone, who is from my birthcountry, upload tones of movies at usuals fps.
This is nothing I can do with this up. I'll up an BBC english version of this particular race in a couple of hours. Thank you for your understanding.
